PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-16602000-10-230,  ,  IA&ND,  TB,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to amend the LITTLE SALMON/CARMACKS FIRST NATION SELF-GOVERNMENT AGREEMENT to empower the first nation to enact laws relating to the implementation of measures made pursuant to any taxation agreement with the Minister of Finance and provide it with a GST refund paid by its government when performing its functions, effective November 1, 2000.
